documents.document: @Armageddonexpo just got up this afternoon and it is freaking hot. Why couldn't it be like this in Taupo yesterday? Wanted to go swimming
@Armageddonexpo I'm up in Auckland for a wedding this long weekend
@mschelseadaly damn, guess you gotta come up to Wellington this year 😙
@RebsNZ going to see if @Eyelish123 can score me an autograph if I flick her some money. Would love to meet him in person
@RebsNZ I can't afford it 😢 I have a wedding to save for Waitangi weekend & then another to go to on the 11th of March
@Armageddonexpo @BillyBoydActor I'm annoyed that 1. I can't afford to go to ChchGeddon and 2. I already have a wedding to go to that day 😢
@RealMichelleT it's totally Friday here in NZ...
@meriamber yet I got my maroon chucks that say DTennant on the heel custom made 😄😃
@RobbieAmell @italiaricci @Spotify I have literally listened to this song 5 times since I got up 3 hours ago
https://t.co/pdLELMXium Fell in love with this song after hearing that @RobbieAmell & @italiaricci played it at their wedding #inlove
https://t.co/rE3UHkhVUY @BrophyJed thought you might be interested in this
@carrieunderwood you were amazing. I really hope that you come back again
@RebsNZ I've seen it twice already. So good
Who out of you & Hannah got the necklace and who got the bracelet that you were given in Auckland? #AskHilly
First @RomanAtwood Smile More shirt sighting in NZ and it was in my office building in Wellington
@HillywoodShow I am getting a lot of ppl doing double takes as I have paired my Demon beanie w/ my Harley Quinn bomber jacket #getyourgeekon
@bensnacks what a fucking twat
Happy Birthday @imcorinnemec hope you have an amazing day. Sending love & hugs from Wellington xox
@meriamber I got to ask Peter Hambleton if he had ever talked to his "son" & he said that yes, he had had the chance to talk to John #gimli
@HillywoodShow so excited that I was finally able to get the Demon beanie in Auckland https://t.co/rxmi3Xx9lB
@HillywoodShow was wondering if you had seen that Bette Midler dressed up as Winnie Sanderson this year https://t.co/BvY6Fs9j64
@SimonMcKinney I'm still loving the video from the Phelps VIP panel #simoncantreverse
@KarenFukuhara I missed catching the pose you did when you noticed me taking a picture but I absolutely love your s… https://t.co/viJOr60EXN
@meriamber so happy that you decided to check out the BaristaCats Café :)
@Eyelish123 @MoC_DamianReid @SimonMcKinney same can't be said for Simon. First day of Auckgeddon '16 hosting stage 2 & already has a hashtag
@Eyelish123 @MoC_DamianReid @SimonMcKinney yeah we can let you off with the title fluff up. It was technically Day 4 and you were exhausted
@Daveisonfire6 this last Saturday they were in Auckland, NZ at Armageddon https://t.co/doLK4oEFB6
VIP panel for @xomalese was amazing. So fun at the start when she turned up 5/10 mins before the… https://t.co/tIiTzaawCI
Dont think anybody will be lending @SimonMcKinney their car for a while after what happened this wknd at @Armageddonexpo #simoncantreverse
@SimonMcKinney thanks for the hilarity this weekend #simoncantreverse
@NZJackie @meriamber @Armageddonexpo me too!!! I was singing it in my head while waiting with @Eyelish123 for Travis' autograph
@MoC_DamianReid awww we love you too
So according to @MoC_DamianReid the movie is called Fantastic "Animals" and Where to Find Them #auckgeddonday3 #noexcuse
@HillywoodShow @Armageddonexpo it was great meeting the two of you. I hope you liked the box of snacks. Hopefully we will see you again soon
@meriamber performing on stage at day two of Auckland Armageddon #auckgeddon 😄❤ https://t.co/5m5cYGmLoa
Finally got to meet @HillyHindi and @HannahHindi with @Redtheabnormal and "selfie propose" with ring pops. They sai… https://t.co/zXOI1ZthVw
@meriamber I now have Take the World On in my head after looking at this https://t.co/g9rVuf3yGt
@HillyHindi @Armageddonexpo have a safe flight. See you on Saturday :)
@fuzzykiwigrl I'm very much looking forward to seeing my "Geddon family" this weekend. It's also my first Auckgeddon
@fuzzykiwigrl I did suffer through three days of 10 and a half hour shifts as I won't be paid for my days off this weekend
@Armageddonexpo @Redtheabnormal finished work for the week, printed off tokens, almost fully packed, ready for bus trip to Akld tomorrow :)
@imcorinnemec I wish I could have something like that for breakfast. Unfortunately for me it is just coffee. No food until lunch :(
@imrosemciver this has become my go to song when I am heading home after a long work week https://t.co/Pbqco20N2V
@HillyHindi what's the first thing you plan on doing when you get to Auckland next week?
@imcorinnemec that's why I have borrowed a charge pack from my friend for bus ride to Auckland next week :)
@imcorinnemec wishing you were in NZ for Auckland Armageddon next week?
@RebsNZ does that mean more money for Geddon or more things for the girls?
@doddleoddle @EvanEdinger another reason why Evan should never travel
@malcolmjgoodwin started laughing immediately as I knew "who" you were talking to. Saw the photo @imrosemciver posted earlier #dommeliv
@imcorinnemec oh my Chuck, that is an adorable pony. I want it!
Damn you @TheCarlosPena!! Now I have DJ Snake and Bieber in my head while at work *shakes fist* #letmeloveyou
@NatTenaLady brightened my day and made me smile before my morning coffee https://t.co/Q5YeRmRMQ4
Yay my @QuestionAnders autograph arrived from Dragon*Con via Leon who was kind enough to get it for me #Blaine #Sark #amazing
@HillywoodShow @MCMComicCon @Armageddonexpo so looking forward to meeting you girls next month in Auckland
Silently fangirling at work after @doddleoddle favourited one of my tweets #blushing
@doddleoddle can't wait to see what he does with Thor :) also looking forward to see @KarlUrban in a @TaikaWaititi movie
@HillyHindi @RebsNZ I need to remember to pack my Doctor Who "shoevians" when I head up to Auckland
@Armageddonexpo @MyLindseyMckeon yay it's Taylor James #OTH
@HillywoodShow @HillyHindi @HannahHindi @YouTube kind of wish I was at home to watch this but am at work making money in order to meet you
@imcorinnemec are they as much of a pest over there as they are in NZ or is it illegal to kill them like in Australia?
This is amazing. @HillyHindi @HannahHindi I am so happy for you. We will celebrate with you in Auckland in October https://t.co/MyCJIJE5vv
@HillyHindi @YouTube it's amazing. Cannot get the song out of my head
@CharlesTrippy when do you not hurt yourself while going to shows? I was surprised you didn't hurt yourself more on Warped Tour
@HillywoodShow so excited that #SherlockParody is out and also seriously excited to meet you two in October at #ArmageddonExpo
Going thru FB memories & a year ago is the autograph from @imcorinnemec when he was nice enough to sign my VIP pass https://t.co/CbdFIZ9i7T
@teefury I'm not a huge fan of the new emails. Would rather see the picture of what is on the tee than a picture of the people wearing them
Just watched @Zoella Ultimate Friendship Test with Mark Ferris and I am legit in tears from laughing so much at the bloopers at the end
@RebsNZ Red just sent me a photo of the tickets for me and her. So many tickets
@EvanEdinger have you ever meet anyone from Lord of the Rings or The Hobbit and if you have what were they like? #AskEvan
@imcorinnemec just found this while looking at the cast list of ID. real or fake credit as I can't see it on IMDb https://t.co/beELB5LXv2
@imrosemciver you're a kiwi and you only just realized this?!
@MorrisonSeth currently listening to it on Spotify :) completely in love with it
@Armageddonexpo I just fangirled in front of my extended family
When Mummy's bed isn't available he will find any available mink blanket to chill on even if it… https://t.co/xtAfSF8woF
If you like pineapple frujus then you will like the new pineapple frozen drink from McDonald's… https://t.co/WEZSsdsBEQ
@Armageddonexpo my guess is someone from the bottom half of the poster in the post on Facebook
@imcorinnemec @BrophyJed could you two be more adorable? #GeddonBFFs
If @CHRIS_Daughtry ever announces a show in NZ I would be very happy as they are top of my concert bucket list #HintHint
Cannot listen to Another One Bites the Dust without having @HillywoodShow TWD Parody in my head. Can't wait until Sherlock Parody comes out
Loving the ability to listen to Spotify while I work. Taking the opportunity to listen to #FeelInvincible by @skilletmusic
That random moment when you have the voice of @flula chanting Rudy over & over in your head #Buddymoon #DavidAndFlula
@QuestionAnders I agree. Alden was really good in Beautiful Creatures and I am looking forward to Rules Don't Apply after seeing the trailer
@HillywoodShow @RobBenedict @Omundson my favourite part of the behind the scenes :D
@Swiftimpala how are you doing?
@Swiftimpala hey, I'm good. Got a new job and had a birthday on Friday so I'm feeling really happy :)
@BrophyJed this just came up on my memories on FB from 2015 :) was great getting to catch up with you last month https://t.co/P2shPBKq6Z
@RebsNZ @fuzzykiwigrl @Jase_Ellis I have no interest in playing the game but it is funny seeing how excited my flatm8s get when they catch 1
@RebsNZ @fuzzykiwigrl @Jase_Ellis this is a zubat https://t.co/sDGR9H762j
@RebsNZ @fuzzykiwigrl @Jase_Ellis my flatmates have been playing it at home. One of them even caught a zubat in my room
@meriamber nice. If you get a chance you shld go to Paris or Rome. They are both amazing. Been 11 yrs since I was there but still recommend
@meriamber where in Europe are you going?
@meriamber my friends and I used to stop and play on the swings when the roller derby was down that end of town
@meriamber if only you were still in Wellington. There are swings on the waterfront. Get to be a child again & have a nice view
@fuzzykiwigrl @RebsNZ I believe they are Ilona Tal and Travis Aaron Wade but do not quote me on that. That is what Bill told us at the party
@meriamber day instantly brightened :) https://t.co/yriTaSr1Y8
@RebsNZ possibly even me or Angie
@RebsNZ Bill told us who they are at the shindig
Need to sleep due to interviews in the morning but really want to keep binge watching @CWiZombie. Damn you @imrosemciver & @RahulKohli13
@RahulKohli13 we still love you. Rose had only nice things to say about you in Wellington last month
@bensnacks have you been hanging out in car parks lately? https://t.co/ytMHKEbQkO
